column1: Efficient Identification of Approximate Best Configuration of Training in Large Datasets
A configuration of training refers to the combinations of feature engineering
column3: and its associated hyperparameters. Given a set of configurations and a large dataset randomly split into training and testing set
column4: we study how to efficiently identify the best configuration with approximately the highest testing accuracy when trained from the training set. To guarantee small accuracy loss
column5: we develop a solution using confidence interval (CI)-based progressive sampling and pruning strategy. Compared to using full data to find the exact best configuration
column6: our solution achieves more than two orders of magnitude speedup
column7: while the returned top configuration has identical or close test accuracy.
